title: Christine McVie - Christine Mcvie (1984)
description:
This was Christine McVie\\\&#039;s second solo album, and it is well worth an hour or so of your time. A great success when it was first released, the music itself is highly evocative of the 1980s, and fans of McVie\\\&#039;s compositions for Fleetwood Mac will not be disappointed. As usual, her keen sense for a good tune is evident, as is wonderful writing (especially with Todd Sharp) and well-crafted sound. Featuring guest work by Lindsey Buckingham, Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood, this album will delight McVie/Fleetwood Mac aficionados, and appeal to anyone who can remember the dizzy pleasure of 80s pop music at its best. 
(Amazon Review).
